name: phcode-api-cf-worker
description: PH Code API running on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.predeploy: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const fse = require('fs-extra'); if(fs.existsSync('./dist')) fse.removeSync('./dist'); fse.copySync('./static', './dist'); fse.copySync('./templates', './dist/templates');"

author: PH Code
